issue.title: [CF 100] It asks to restart wow every time and does nothing
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 5.1.2600 Service Pack 3

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 3.0.1a

Description

It asks to restart wow every time and does nothing

Steps to Reproduce

logging on WoW is all it takes.

Installed Addons

Castbars - 3.6 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.71-r5040 Doom_CooldownPulse - 1.2.5 IceHUD - 1.7.4.2 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.0 OmniCC - 4.0.waffles11 Recount - v4.0.1e release TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 3.0.1a


> Posted by CurseForge user Melendez8536 | Imported from CurseForge issue #100 | Raw
